com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Interface RankingModelTrainer<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PerceptronRankingModelTrainer<T>

    public interface RankingModelTrainer<T>
    Trains a machine learning model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCutoff()
      Statistical cutoff for feature inclusion: features must appear at least this many times to be included in the model.
      void setCutoff(int cutoff) 
      void setParameters(Map<String,Object> parameters)
      Set parameters for this trainer type.
      RankingModel trainModel(RankingEventStream<T> corpusEventStream, Ranker<T> ranker, List<String> featureDescriptors)
      Return the RankingModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
      RankingModel trainModel(RankingEventStream<T> corpusEventStream, Ranker<T> ranker, Map<String,List<String>> descriptors)
      Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.

    • Method Detail

      • trainModel

        RankingModel trainModel(RankingEventStream<T> corpusEventStream,
                      Ranker<T> ranker,
                      List<String> featureDescriptors)
        Return the RankingModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
        Parameters:
        corpusEventStream - the event stream containing the events to be used for training
        featureDescriptors - the feature descriptors required to apply this model to new data.
        Returns:

      • trainModel

        RankingModel trainModel(RankingEventStream<T> corpusEventStream,
                      Ranker<T> ranker,
                      Map<String,List<String>> descriptors)
        Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
        Parameters:
        corpusEventStream - the event stream containing the events to be used for training
        descriptors - all of the descriptors required to perform analysis using this model (e.g. feature descriptors, etc.)
        Returns:

      • getCutoff

        int getCutoff()
        Statistical cutoff for feature inclusion: features must appear at least this many times to be included in the model. Note that for numeric features, any value > 0 counts as 1 occurrence for cutoff purposes.
        Returns:

      • setCutoff

        void setCutoff(int cutoff)

      • setParameters

        void setParameters(Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Set parameters for this trainer type.
        Parameters:
        parameters -
